Product Experience

A self service data product granting users access to our data lake, a sandbox space for collaboration, connected to Jupyter notebooks for data science, and integrated with Tableau for data visualizations.

  • Increased usage from 300 to 1200 users
  • Prioritized backlog Kanban style
  • Created and presented roadmap to CIO

Utilized Kubernetes and Docker to create a containerized environment for querying our massive data lake with Dremio, creating virtual datasets, and publishing tables.

  • Started with 0 users, gradually rolled out to 1000's
  • Created documentation from scratch and shared to our Yammer page
  • Trained new users on Dremio
  • Managed onboarding and migration plan

Developed a web application of APIs for highly accessed datasets.

  • Started with 0 users and increased to 20
  • Designed UI using Figma
  • Coordinated multiple teams for delivery and increased the number of APIs available
  • Conducted usability tests and improved the UI further
